Game.Name: Masters of Combat (Europe)
Game.plot: Choose one of four colossal fighters, each one with a number of special moves and fighting techniques, and go head-to-head against the other three! Take on a friend in an exhibition combat, or make your way to the top in the one-player tournament, where you must fight for your life - and the lives of all the people on Earth!http://www.gamefaqs.com/console/sms/home/566291.htmlCheat: Enemy Zero LifeGet a high score and enter the initials KEY. This unlocks the Extra Difficulty Level and also a level where enemies are defeated after a single hit.Cheat: Extra Difficulty Level, Faster on NTSCComplete the game on Normal or Hard level. Now there's an EXTRA level available, as well as a NO WAIT FOR NTSC option which makes the game run proportionally faster on NTSC (US/Japanese) consoles.
Game.Notes: Choose one of four colossal fighters, each one with a number of special moves and fighting techniques, and go head-to-head against the other three! Take on a friend in an exhibition combat, or make your way to the top in the one-player tournament, where you must fight for your life - and the lives of all the people on Earth!
